sys_security_acl.description: Allow write for records in x_g_ni4_interdivis_interdivision_work_order, for users with role admin, and if the ACL script returns true.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>false</advanced><condition/><description>Allow write for records in x_g_ni4_interdivis_interdivision_work_order, for users with role admin, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>x_g_ni4_interdivis_interdivision_work_order</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = checkWriteState();


function checkWriteState() {
	
	
	if( gs.getUserID(). == current.u_administrative_officer)
		return true;
	
	return false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnz1202</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-10 20:26:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e7103a381b5a2c10f5659605bc4bcb2e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_g_ni4_interdivis_interdivision_work_order</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Interdivision Work Order" source="x_g_ni4_interdivis">bd43f2a41bc6ac507562a7dcac4bcb29</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Interdivision Work Order">bd43f2a41bc6ac507562a7dcac4bcb29</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_e7103a381b5a2c10f5659605bc4bcb2e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jnz1202</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-10 20:29:06</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
